plugin.name: XiYouJi_Decode_Filter
plugin.author: Li Ying
plugin.purpose: Remove unnormal chars from TianShu decode output line
plugin.description: Remove BS char from output line when I use decode command.

muclient.script:
-- display one line
require "tprint"
--ÒÆ³ýBS×Ö·û function OnDecodeLine (name, line, wildcards, styles) --tprint(styles) for _, v in ipairs(styles) do --local s = string.gsub( v.text, "%x08+", "" ) local s = v.text if ( string.byte(s, 1) == 8 ) then s = string.sub( s, v.length - 1, -1 ) end ColourTell (RGBColourToName(v.textcolour), RGBColourToName (v.backcolour), s) end Note("") end
function decode_filter_on (name, line, wildcards, styles) EnableTrigger("tianshu_decode_line", true) end
function decode_filter_off (name, line, wildcards, styles) EnableTrigger("tianshu_decode_line", false) end
